name: spotter

scripts.publish:calculator-plugin: nx build calculator-plugin && cp packages/calculator-plugin/package.json dist/packages/calculator-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/calculator-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json
scripts.publish:applications-plugin: nx build applications-plugin && cp packages/applications-plugin/package.json dist/packages/applications-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/applications-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json

scripts.publish:web-plugin: nx build web-plugin && cp packages/web-plugin/package.json dist/packages/web-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/web-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json
scripts.publish:emoji-plugin: nx build emoji-plugin && cp packages/emoji-plugin/package.json dist/packages/emoji-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/emoji-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json
scripts.publish:brave-plugin: nx build brave-plugin && cp packages/brave-plugin/package.json dist/packages/brave-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/brave-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json
scripts.publish:vscode-plugin: nx build vscode-plugin && cp packages/vscode-plugin/package.json dist/packages/vscode-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/vscode-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json
scripts.publish:bluetooth-plugin: nx build bluetooth-plugin && cp packages/bluetooth-plugin/package.json dist/packages/bluetooth-plugin/package.json && cd dist/packages/bluetooth-plugin && npm publish && rm package.json
